titleStmt.title: SII 8.6: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 6. (A.R. No. 420 of 1902). ON THE EAST WALL OF THE SAME SHRINE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tirumaṉṉi vaḷara Irunilamaṭan=taiyum porccayappāvaiyuñ cirttaṉic celviyu n=taṉ perun=te viyarāki Iṉpuṟa neṭutiya lūḻiyu ḷiṭaituṟaināṭu n=tuṭarvaṉaveliyum paṭar vaṉavāciyuñ cuḷḷicūḻ matiṭ koḷḷippāk=kaiyu naṇṇaṟkarumaraṇ maṇṇaik=kaṭak=kamum porukaṭa liḻattaraicartam muṭiyum Āṅkavar teviya roṅkeḻil
muṭiyum muṉṉavarpakkal teṉṉavar vaitta cun=taramuṭiyum In=tira ṉāramu n=teṇṭirai Īḻamaṇṭala muḻuvatum Eṟipaṭai k=keraḷaṉ muṟaimaiyiṟ cūṭuṅ kulataṉamākiya palar pukaḻ muṭiyuñ ceṅkatir mālaiyuñ caṅkatir velait tolperuṅ kāvaṟ pal paḻan=tivu māpporu taṇṭāṟ koṇṭa kopparakesarivarmmarāna śrīrāje
ndracoḻadevarkku yāṇṭu 6 Āṟāvatu jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu puravuvaritiṇaikkaḷanāyakaṉ Ūṟṟukkāṭṭuk=koṭṭattu nirveḷurnāṭṭut toṟuvaṉkāraṇaip pontaippākkiḻāṉ makaṉ ṉ kaccippeṭṭu tirukkāraikkāṭuṭaiya mahāde varkkut tirunon=tāviḷa k=koṉṟiṉuk=ku vaitta Āṭu toṇṇūṟu . Ivvāṭu toṇṇūṟuñ candrādityavaT cāvā muvāp perāṭāka
k kaiyyuṟṟu Ittevarkarmikaḷvacam niṉṟāṉāley nicatam Uḻakku ney yaḷantu koṭuttut taravukoḷveṉāṉeṉ maṇaiyiṟkoṭṭattuk kumarakkoṭṭappuṟattup piccipākkattu maṉṟāṭi Amarāvaṉ vaṉṟoṇṭaṉeṉ . nicata meykkaṇṭu coṟu kuṭuppeṉākavum . Ivaṉ colla Eḻutiṉeṉ Innakara k=karaṇattān 4 10000 8 1000 van karumāṇikkamāna Icapamaṅkalādittanen .
Digital edition of SII 8.6 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
